org.shared.image

Class IntegralHistogram

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.shared.array.ProtoArray<T,double[],E>
      • org.shared.array.AbstractArray<R,C,R,Double>
        • org.shared.array.AbstractRealArray<RealArray,ComplexArray>
          • org.shared.array.RealArray
            • org.shared.image.IntegralHistogram
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cloneable, Array<RealArray,Double>, Matrix<RealArray,Double>

    public class IntegralHistogram
extends RealArray
    A data structure for computing the histogram over any rectangular region quickly.

      protected static int[] getDimensionsPlusOne(RealArray arr, int nBins)
      Gets the original dimensions plus one with an additional "bins" dimension at the end.
      int nBins()
      Gets the number of bins.
      double[] query(double[] res, int... bounds)
      Queries for the values histogram within a rectangular region, whose bounds are expressed in the same way as ProtoArray.subarray(int...).
